title: Cancel any modal dialog window (including the Start Workspace)
Navigate between fields in opposite direction
Cycle through tools with the same shortcut key
shortcut: <kbd>⇧</kbd> + press shortcut key (if Use <kbd>⇧</kbd> Key for Tool Switch preference is selected)

title: Cycle through hidden tools
shortcut: <kbd>⌥</kbd> + click + tool (except Add Anchor Point, Delete Anchor Point, and Convert Point tools)

title: Rectangular Marquee tool / Elliptical Marquee tool
Lasso tool / Polygonal Lasso tool / Magnetic Lasso tool
Magic Wand tool / Quick Selection tool
Crop tool / Slice tool / Slice Select tool
Eyedropper tool / Color Sampler tool / Ruler tool / Note tool
Spot Healing Brush tool / Healing Brush tool / Patch tool / Red Eye tool
Brush tool / Pencil tool / Color Replacement tool / Mixer Brush tool
Clone Stamp tool / Pattern Stamp tool
History Brush tool / Art History Brush tool
Eraser tool / Background Eraser tool / Magic Eraser tool
Dodge tool / Burn tool / Sponge tool
Horizontal Type tool / Vertical Type tool / Horizontal Type mask tool / Vertical Type mask tool
Path Selection tool / Direct Selection tool
Rectangle tool / Rounded Rectangle tool / Ellipse tool / Polygon tool / Line tool / Custom Shape tool
Toggle (forward) between Standard screen mode, Full screen mode with menu bar, and Full screen mode
Toggle (backward) between Standard screen mode, Full screen mode with menu bar, and Full screen mode
Toggle (forward) canvas color
shortcut: <kbd>Spacebar</kbd> <kbd>F</kbd> (or <kbd>⌃</kbd> + click canvas background and select color)

title: Switch to Hand tool (when not in text-edit mode)
Simultaneously pan multiple documents with Hand tool
Move Zoom marquee while dragging with the Zoom tool
Apply zoom percentage, and keep zoom percentage box active
shortcut: <kbd>⇧</kbd> <kbd>R</kbd>eturn in Navigator panel zoom percentage box

title: Zoom in on specified area of an image
shortcut: <kbd>⌘</kbd> + drag over preview in Navigator panel

title: Temporarily zoom into an image
shortcut: Hold down <kbd>H</kbd> + click in the image and hold down the mouse button

title: Scroll image with Hand tool
shortcut: <kbd>Spacebar</kbd> + drag, or drag view area box in Navigator panel

title: Move view to upper-left corner or lower-right corner
Toggle layer mask on/off as rubylith (layer mask must be selected)
Open the Refine Edge dialog box
Toggle between original image and selection preview
Toggle between original selection and refined version
Toggle radius preview on and off
Toggle between Refine Radius and Erase Refinements tools
Apply a new filter on top of selected
Reverse direction for Bloat, Pucker, Push Left, and Mirror tools
Continually sample the distortion
shortcut: <kbd>⌥</kbd> + drag in preview with Reconstruct tool, Displace, Amplitwist, or Affine mode selected

title: Decrease/increase brush size by 2, or density, pressure, rate, or turbulent jitter by 1
shortcut: <kbd>↓</kbd>/<kbd>↑</kbd> in Brush Size, Density, Pressure, Rate, or Turbulent Jitter text box

title: Decrease/increase brush size by 2, or density, pressure, rate, or turbulent jitter by 1
shortcut: <kbd>←</kbd>/<kbd>→</kbd> with Brush Size, Density, Pressure, Rate, or Turbulent Jitter slider showing

title: Cycle through controls on right from top
Cycle through controls on right from bottom
Fill a selection with image under the pointer
Create a duplicate of the selection as a floating selection
Select a plane under another selected plane
Create 90 degree plane off parent plane
Delete last node while creating plane
Make a full canvas plane, square to the camera
Presets panel
shortcut: <kbd>⌘</kbd> <kbd>⌥</kbd> <kbd>9</kbd> (macOS Universal Access zoom shortcut must be disabled in System Preferences)

title: Increase/decrease Adjustment Brush tool flow in increments of 10
Temporarily switch from Add to Erase mode for theAdjustment Brush tool, or from Erase to Add mode
Increase/decrease temporary Adjustment Brush tool size
Increase/decrease temporary Adjustment Brush tool feather
Increase/decrease temporary Adjustment Brush tool flow in increments of 10
Switch to New mode from Add or Erase mode of theAdjustment Brush tool or the Graduated Filter
Toggle Auto Mask for Adjustment Brush tool
Toggle Show Mask for Adjustment Brush tool
Toggle pins for Adjustment Brush tool
Toggle overlay for Graduated Filter, Spot Removal tool, or Red Eye Removal tool.
Temporarily switch to Zoom In tool
Temporarily switch to Zoom Out tool and change the Open Image button to Open Copy and the Cancel button to Reset.
Temporarily activate the White Balance tool and change the Open Image button to Open Object.
Select multiple points in Curves panel
shortcut: Click the first point; <kbd>⇧</kbd> + click additional points

title: Add point to curve in Curves panel
Move selected point in Curves panel (1 unit)
Move selected point in Curves panel (10 units)
Open selected images in Camera Raw dialog box from Bridge
Open selected images from Bridge bypassing Camera Raw dialog box
Display highlights that will be clipped in Preview
shortcut: <kbd>⌥</kbd> + drag Exposure, Recovery, or Black sliders

title: Change the values of the closest color slider
Select next point on the curve
Select the previous point on the curve
Select multiple points on the curve
To delete a point on the curve
shortcut: Select a point and press Delete

title: Display highlights and shadows that will be clipped
Set a point to the composite curve
Set a point to the channel curves
Reposition marquee while selecting
shortcut: Any marquee tool (except single column and single row) + <kbd>spacebar</kbd> + drag

title: Intersect a selection
shortcut: Any selection tool (except Quick Selection tool) + <kbd>⇧</kbd> <kbd>⌥</kbd> + drag

title: Constrain marquee to square or circle (if no other selections are active)
Draw marquee from center (if no other selections are active)
Constrain shape and draw marquee from center
Switch to Move tool
shortcut: <kbd>⌘</kbd> (e<kbd>x</kbd>cept when Hand, Slice, Path, Shape, or any Pen tool is selected)

title: Switch from Magnetic Lasso tool to Lasso tool
Switch from Magnetic Lasso tool to polygonal Lasso tool
Move layer 1 pixel when nothing selected on layer
Toggle crop shield off and on
Snap guide to ruler ticks (except when View Snap is unchecked)
Convert between horizontal and vertical guide
Transform from center or reflect
category: Transform selections, selection borders, and paths

title: Constrain
category: Transform selections, selection borders, and paths

title: Distort
category: Transform selections, selection borders, and paths

title: Apply
category: Transform selections, selection borders, and paths

title: Cancel
category: Transform selections, selection borders, and paths

title: Free transform with duplicate data
category: Transform selections, selection borders, and paths

title: Transform again with duplicate data
category: Transform selections, selection borders, and paths

title: Duplicate a path
shortcut: Pen (any Pen tool), Path Selection or Direct Selection tool + <kbd>⌘</kbd> <kbd>⌥</kbd> + drag

title: Switch from Path Selection, Pen, Add Anchor Point, Delete Anchor Point, or Convert Point tools to Direct Selection tool
Switch from Pen tool or Freeform Pen tool to Convert Point tool when pointer is over anchor or direction point
Select foreground color from color picker
Select foreground color from image with Eyedropper tool
shortcut: Any painting tool + <kbd>⌥</kbd> or any shape tool + <kbd>⌥</kbd> (except when Paths <kbd>⌥</kbd> is selected)

title: Sets opacity, tolerance, strength, or exposure for painting mode
shortcut: Any painting or editing tool + number keys (e.g., 0 = 100%, 1 = 10%, 4 then 5 in quick succession = 45%) (when airbrush <kbd>⌥</kbd> is enabled, use <kbd>⇧</kbd> + number keys)

title: Sets flow for painting mode
shortcut: Any painting or editing tool + <kbd>⇧</kbd> + number keys (e.g., 0 = 100%, 1 = 10%, 4 then 5 in quick succession = 45%) (when airbrush <kbd>⌥</kbd> is enabled, omit <kbd>⇧</kbd>)

title: Mixer Brush changes Wet and Mix to zero
Open Fill dialog box on background or standard layer
Fill with foreground or background color
Connects points with a straight line
Set blending mode to Threshold for bitmap images, Normal for all other images
Move type in image
shortcut: <kbd>⌘</kbd> + drag type when Type layer is selected

title: Select 1 character left/right or 1 line down/up, or 1 word left/right
Select characters from insertion point to mouse click point
Move 1 character left/right, 1 line down/up, or 1 word left/right
Create a new text layer, when a text layer is selected in the Layers panel
Select a word, line, paragraph, or story
Display the bounding box for transforming text when editing text, or activate Move tool if cursor is inside the bounding box
Scale text within a bounding box when resizing the bounding box
Move text box while creating text box
Justify paragraph, left aligns last line
Decrease or increase type size of selected text 2 points or pixels
Decrease or increase leading 2 points or pixels
Decrease or increase baseline shift 2 points or pixels
Set options for new items (except for Actions, Animation, Styles, Brushes, Tool Presets, and Layer Comps panels)
Delete without confirmation (except for the Brush panel)
Apply value and keep text box active
Show/Hide all panels except the toolbox and options bar
Define Auto options for Levels or Curves
Display precise cross hair for brushes
Scale (increase or reduce size) Clone Source
Duplicate any image state, except the current state
Permanently clear history (no Undo)
shortcut: <kbd>⌥</kbd> + click clear History (in History panel pop‑up menu)

title: Load layer transparency as a selection
Load filter mask as a selection
Create new empty layer with dialog box
Create new layer below target layer
Add to layer selection in Layers panel
Merge a copy of all visible layers into target layer
Merge layers
shortcut: Highlight the layers you want to merge, then <kbd>⌘</kbd> <kbd>E</kbd>

title: Move layer to bottom or top
Copy current layer to layer below
shortcut: <kbd>⌥</kbd> Merge Down <kbd>⌘</kbd> from the Panel pop‑up menu

title: Merge all visible layers to a new layer above the currently selected layer
shortcut: <kbd>⌥</kbd> Merge Visible <kbd>⌘</kbd> from the Panel pop‑up menu

title: Show/hide this layer/layer group only or all layers/layer groups
Show/hide all other currently visible layers
Toggle lock transparency for target layer, or last applied lock
Open Layer Mask Display Options dialog box
Toggle rubylith mode for layer mask on/off
Select all type; temporarily select Type tool
Create a clipping mask
shortcut: <kbd>⌥</kbd> + click the line dividing two layers

title: Create new layer group below current layer/layer set
Create new layer group with dialog box
Create layer mask that hides all/selection
Create vector mask that reveals all/path area
Create vector mask that hides all or displays path area
Display layer group properties
shortcut: <kbd>⌃</kbd> + click the layer group and choose Group Properties, or double-click group

title: Retain intersection of path as selection
Set options for Fill Path with Foreground Color button, Stroke Path with Brush button, Load Path as a Selection button, Make Work Path from Selection button, and Create New Path button
Create new swatch from foreground color
shortcut: Click in empty area of panel

title: Set swatch color as background color
